SEARCH
Package Model.DAO

Class CategoryDAO

java.lang.Object
Model.DAO.CategoryDAO
public class CategoryDAO extends Object
The CategoryDAO (Data Access Object) class is responsible for handling all database operations related to categories. This includes saving, updating, loading, and deleting category records.

  • Constructor Details

    • CategoryDAO

      public CategoryDAO()

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save(Category c)
      Saves a new category to the database. Inserts a category with its details into the Categories table.
      Parameters:
      c - The category to be saved.

    • loadAll

      public List<Category> loadAll()
      Loads all categories from the database. Retrieves all category records from the Categories table.
      Returns:
      A list of all categories.

    • update

      public void update(Category category, String oldCode)
      Updates a category in the database. Modifies the details of an existing category in the Categories table.
      Parameters:
      category - The category with updated information.
      oldCode - The original code of the category to be updated.

    • delete

      public void delete(Category c)
      Deletes a category from the database. Removes a category record from the Categories table.
      Parameters:
      c - The category to be deleted.
